titles.title: Producing Real Opportunities for Technology and Entrepreneurs Investing in Nutrition Act
Producing Real Opportunities for Technology and Entrepreneurs Investing in Nutrition Act

A bill to amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish research centers of excellence for alternative protein innovation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
